an4.39:4.1: Atha kho ujjayo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an4.39:4.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an4.39:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho ujjayo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an4.39:4.6: “Na kho ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, sabbaṃ yaññaṃ vaṇṇemi;
an4.39:4.7: na panāhaṃ, brāhmaṇa, sabbaṃ yaññaṃ na vaṇṇemi.
an4.39:4.8: Yathārūpe kho, brāhmaṇa, yaññe gāvo haññanti, ajeḷakā haññanti, kukkuṭasūkarā haññanti, vividhā pāṇā saṅghātaṃ āpajjanti;
an4.39:4.9: evarūpaṃ kho ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, sārambhaṃ yaññaṃ na vaṇṇemi.
an4.39:4.11: Evarūpañhi, brāhmaṇa, sārambhaṃ yaññaṃ na upasaṅkamanti arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā.
an4.39:5.1: Yathārūpe ca kho, brāhmaṇa, yaññe neva gāvo haññanti, na ajeḷakā haññanti, na kukkuṭasūkarā haññanti, na vividhā pāṇā saṅghātaṃ āpajjanti;
an4.39:5.2: evarūpaṃ kho ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, nirārambhaṃ yaññaṃ vaṇṇemi, yadidaṃ niccadānaṃ anukulayaññaṃ.
an4.39:5.4: Evarūpañhi, brāhmaṇa, nirārambhaṃ yaññaṃ upasaṅkamanti arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannāti.
an4.39:6.3: Mahāyaññā mahārambhā,
an4.39:8.4: vividhā nettha haññare;
an4.39:9.1: Etaṃ yajetha medhāvī,
an4.39:9.3: Etaṃ hi yajamānassa,
